example.name: autogen1
example.text: Mr. Steinhardt , who runs about $ 1.7 billion for Steinhardt Partners , made his name as a gunslinging trader , moving in and out of stocks with agility -- enriching himself and his investment clients .
example.arg: Mr. Steinhardt , who runs about $ 1.7 billion for Steinhardt Partners , ---> *-4
moving in and out of stocks
